thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 15 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: In win for SAP, U.S. appeals court tosses 'abstract' software patent

author: Jan Wolfe
title: In win for SAP, U.S. appeals court tosses 'abstract' software patent

organizations.name: u.s. court of appeals for the federal circuit

text:
A federal appeals court on Tuesday brought a likely end to a patent infringement claim brought against the U.S. arm of software giant SAP by a small Texas-based company.
The U.S. Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit affirmed a lower court decision that invalidated InvestPic LLCâ€™s 2002 patent on a method for performing statistical analyses of investment information.
To read the full story on Westlaw Practitioner Insights, click here: bit.ly/2rJJGrR
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
